name: Schlo: Final Stand
description:
The next installment of the Schlo series, Schlo: Final Stand, appears as a demo. Follow T. Chlroid, an insecure genetically engineered human, as he struggles in an attempt to turn his cherished friendship with an important public figure into something else.

The demo is about 25% of the complete storyline, mainly introducing concepts of the Schlo society that will be manipulated in different ways later on.

Featuring characters seen in "what is schlo?" and "a better schlo dating simulation", it could also serve as a standalone project. It is technically a sequel to "what is schlo?", while the later parts would take place at the same time as "a better schlo dating simulation".

Potential trigger warning: mention of suicidal tendencies, self-harm, eating disorders...it also features a decent amount of sexual humor and mention of sexual acts, though there aren't any plans of depicting that.
